name: Horse Plinko
description:
Have you seen the Horse Plinko gif, and ever craved to see the floppy ragdolls of horses live?

Now you can!

Note - Horse Volume may be loud.

R - Restart, destroy all horses

Spacebar - Spawn a horse

Number 1-10 - Change number of horses to spawn at once

Made this in a weekend over my free time, have fun!
